title: WHY CONTROL WARD?
body:
Okay riot...
I understand, that you just want to make your game better and I love what you are doing, but can't you cancel some of your changes? I think your changes about invisibility are really good (elso about the pink ward), but why would you change the name and design of the pink? I'ts a really different feeling with the “control ward“ and i think, that most of the LoL players really miss the pink ward and wish, you will bring him back to rift.

Anyway ,love you riot ...continue what you are doing and sorry for my bad english xD

Hope you think about this bb

replies.body: Control wards do exactly what the name implies which means it disables any traps and wards around it too lol
Sure but i dont think it was a good decision they could just have changed the pink and dont delet it
Control ward does exactly what the pink did with the addition of controlling enemy vision by shutting all enemy wards within its zone. It demands attention the enemy or they lose part of the map.
I believe control wards do not detect invisible or stealth units, one of the two. cant remember because I only use it to destroy enemy wards.

>
> I believe control wards do not detect invisible or stealth units, one of the two. cant remember because I only use it to destroy enemy wards.

They don't detect Invisible units such as Teemo, Vayne, or Talon. They do detect Camouflage units like Rengar, Evelynn, and Twitch.
yes thats it, I need to remember this for future games. thanks
I kind of want to suggest a Pink Ward ward skin, where all Control wards show up Pink. Ideally permanently available for small amount of IP, but that's wishful thinking.
